sentence: No matter if it was something in the room at one of the restaurants or at the pool
Plus any service at the pool if you want even more attention
Daniel Trevino kept pool dwelers enganged in varied activities

Le Blanc Spa Resort in Cancun I ’d suggest that you make the hotel reservation through a Diamond member to get VIP benefits including 1 free airport transfers 2 3 tours person that do not come out of your resort credits or have a room charge you can choose from Tulum Express Chitchen Itza or Wet’N Wild excluding the Ultimate Dolphin Swim 3 a 25minute back massage per person 4 a 25minute Manicure Palace per person 5 a 25minute Pedicure Palace per person that does not come out of your resort credits or have a room charge and 6 a 20 discount on additional spa services
The pool bar bartenders unfortunately suffer from tip me and you will get service syndrome however I am becoming used to this as a norm these days so it did not bother me
It is absolutely quieter than Moon Palace without the kids adult only resort and pools are cleaner and are open later
We went to the sauna steam room hydro massage and finally the jacuzi
You have to do outside through the main pool area to get to the entrance
I finally had to go to management and had a pool chair taken to the beach b c of how uncomfortable the beach chairs are
Lunch service pool and beach side were both served quickly and hot
The polside and swim up bar service was excellent thanks to the hardworking crew
THE POLSGorgeous infinity pool overlooking the picturesque beach
Excellent pool area and spa

The pools are beautiful and clean with brilliant service from a team that work so hard all day to keep you refreshed I do n’t know where they get their energyI could go on and on about how amazing this place is but honestly just go and experience it it ’s wonderful I ca n’t wait to go back after the refurbishment that is happening later this year I believe they reopen in November
Jesus pool manager personally went out of his way to get me the exact coconut milk I needed for my drink
Daniel a server around the pool and beach remembered us from last year and was as entusiastic as ever
Hugo also made us a nice display and set up the Jacuzi for us on the one night we asked for it
The bartenders kept us smiling and the pool staff made sure we had towels and beverages throughout the day
Christian at Lagoon pool and Asian restaurant was superb

They have mutiple pools plenty of cabanas food and drink service on the beach a gym swim up pool bars awarm pool lots of seating in both the sun and shade multiple restaurants butlers on each floor multiple night bars a store and employees that help you book your travels plus much more
